entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
